abilities.name: Glorious Radiance
abilities.details: Ra’sutekh gains bonus [ap]magical power[/] based on the nearby Obelisks.

abilities.name: Searing Beam
abilities.details: Ra’sutekh fires a concentrated beam of solar energy from his staff in a long line, dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) to all enemies hit.[n]If the beam passes through an Obelisk, the beam refracts, creating two additional smaller beams that fire at 45-degree angles from the Obelisk, dealing slightly reduced damage.[n]The refracted beam can be further refracted by multiple Obelisks, dealing the same damage.

abilities.name: Rise of the Obelisk
abilities.details: Ra’sutekh summons an Obelisk at a target location for a duration (max 3 Obelisks). Obelisks fires a solar beam at nearby enemies, dealing minor [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) and reducing their [db]magical resistance[/] for a few seconds.[n]Obelisks have their own health bar and can be destroyed by enemies.

abilities.name: Solar Flare
abilities.details: Ra’sutekh commands his Obelisks to fire a flare of light toward a target location. Upon impact, each light deals [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) and [db]slows[/] all enemies hit.[n]Enemy hits by subsequent flares take reduced damage. If Ra’sutekh has no Obelisks active, he instead fires a single flare from his staff at half the range.

abilities.name: Blinded by the Sun
abilities.details: Ra’sutekh raises his staff, channeling the full intensity of the sun's core. After a short delay, each Obelisk radiates a burst of light that deals [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) and briefly [db]blind[/] all nearby enemies.[n]For the next few seconds, Ra’sutekh's Obelisks become [bf]invulnerable[/] and gain increased [bf]attack speed.[n]
